articles.title: Sample Article No.3
articles.body:
The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
- George Santayana

articles.title: Sample Article No.1
articles.body:
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
- Mahatma Gandhi

articles.title: Sample Article No.2
articles.body:
Genius is 1 percent inspiration and 99 percent perspiration.
- Thomas Alva Edison
